# National Master Standing Offer for Hand Tools

## Reference Number
WS4286859613-Doc4339363988

## Amended Solicitation
Fourth amendment

## Tender Closing Date
June 13, 2024, 2:00 PM (Eastern Time)

## Expected Contract Start Date
August 1, 2024

## Expected Contract End Date
Not Applicable

## Tender Status
Expired

## Scope of Work
The National Master Standing Offer (NMSO) is for the supply of hand tools, including Federal Stock Classes 5110, 5120, 5130, 5133, 5136, 5140, and 5180. This is a call for tenders for a one (1) year contract, plus two (2) one-year option periods.

## Requirements
This tender will be competed with an open bidding process. The Government will only accept tenders transmitted through the SAP Ariba platform.

## Preference Policy
This procurement includes a set-aside under the Government's Procurement Strategy for Aboriginal Business.

## Delivery and Reporting
Deliveries will be required throughout Canada, with the exception of any land claims areas. Reporting requirements will be specified in the contract.

## Compliance
All tenderers must comply with the Government's standard terms and conditions, available on the Government of Canada's website.

The National Master Standing Offer (NMSO) for Hand Tools is a call for tenders to provide a wide range of hand tools to the Government of Canada. The contract will be for a period of one (1) year, with the option to extend for two (2) further one-year periods. Deliveries will be required throughout Canada, with the exception of any land claims areas.

Please note that only tenders transmitted through the SAP Ariba platform will be accepted. All tenderers must comply with the Government's standard terms and conditions and follow the instructions outlined in the tender document.
